column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Fantastic food and service!! Came here with a friend after pulling an all-nighter bar crawl around town. We figured we could use something to nurse our hangovers... Ramen hit the spot! Our server was great - She answered all of our weird questions about the menu. I told her we were hungover as hell and she got us extra ice waters and then totally understood why we were asking for anything spicy on the side
column2: lol. Thank you!! I will definitely be recommending this to my friends looking for great ramen in Houston.
